text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Drivers' school" means, except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, any person in the business of giving instruction in the driving of motor vehicles.

"Drivers' school" does not include:
Any public school or other noncollegiate educational institution giving instruction in the driving of motor vehicles during its normal school hours and not charging a fee for this instruction; or
Any college, university, or other institution of postsecondary education approved by the Maryland Higher Education Commission.

text.section: "License" means a drivers' school license issued by the Administration under this subtitle.
